attributes.action: Make it legal to turn left when traffic lights are red.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In order to reduce congestion in cities I propose copying the North American law of being able to take a left turn through a red traffic light.  I believe that this will help traffic to flow a lot better in towns where there are traffic lights every 200 meters.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
